name: Air-Fried Kale Chips
author: LauraF
summary: I harvested some kale from my garden this weekend and decided to make chips in an air fryer instead of the oven. It's super quick!
ingredients: 1 pinch ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste
directions: Preheat an air fryer to 360 degrees F (180 degrees C) according to manufacturer's instructions
Stir kale leaves off the stems and chop into small pieces
Place in a large bowl; add olive oil, salt, paprika, garlic powder, pepper, and cayenne
Add a layer of kale leaves to the air fryer basket
Shake the basket and pour kale out onto a cutting board or baking sheet to cool and crisp up
Repeat with remaining kale, working in batches to prevent it from steaming and getting soggy
